## NormalizedCommit type

Normalized Commit

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NormalizedCommit = {
    sha: string;
    message: string;
    parent: string[];
    author: {
        name: string;
        email: string;
        timestamp: Date;
    };
    committer: {
        name: string;
        email: string;
        timestamp: Date;
    };
    gpgsig?: string;
};
```
